ps1.9:1.2_0: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiyā pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:1.2_1: sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:1.2_2: kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:1.2_4: cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:1.2_5: cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:1.2_9: nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.
ps1.9:2.1_0: Abhiniropanaṭṭhena sammāsaṅkappo micchāsaṅkappassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:2.1_1: sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:2.1_2: kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:2.1_4: cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:2.1_5: cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:2.1_9: nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.
ps1.9:3.1_0: Pariggahaṭṭhena sammāvācā micchāvācāya pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:3.1_1: sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:3.1_2: kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:3.1_4: cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:3.1_5: cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:3.1_9: nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.
ps1.9:4.1_0: Samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammākammanto micchākammantassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:4.1_1: sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:4.1_2: kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:4.1_3: cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:4.1_4: cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:4.1_8: nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.
ps1.9:5.1_0: Vodānaṭṭhena sammāājīvo micchāājīvassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca …pe…
ps1.9:5.2_0: paggahaṭṭhena sammāvāyāmo micchāvāyāmassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca …pe…
ps1.9:5.3_0: upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammāsati micchāsatiyā pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca …pe…
ps1.9:5.4_0: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi micchāsamādhissa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:5.4_1: sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:5.4_2: kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:5.4_4: cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:5.4_5: cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:5.4_9: nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.
ps1.9:6.2_0: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi oḷārikassa kāmarāgasaññojanassa paṭighasaññojanassa oḷārikassa kāmarāgānusayassa
ps1.9:6.2_1: paṭighānusayassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:6.2_2: sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:6.2_3: kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:6.2_5: cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:6.2_6: cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:6.2_10: nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.
ps1.9:7.2_1: anusahagatassa kāmarāgānusayassa paṭighānusayassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:7.2_2: sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:7.2_3: kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:7.2_5: cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:7.2_6: cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:7.2_10: nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.
ps1.9:8.2_0: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi rūparāgassa arūparāgassa mānassa uddhaccassa avijjāya,
ps1.9:8.2_1: mānānusayassa bhavarāgānusayassa avijjānusayassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:8.2_2: sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:8.2_3: kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:8.2_5: cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa,
ps1.9:8.2_10: nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.
